page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: {Smyatts Farm}is in Burnham Road. It is a nursery with twenty acres of land. One and a half acres are covered with glass houses. Mr. Pipe and his brother run it and their wives work on the farm too. They only employ one other person and she was already working there when Mr. Pipe went there thirty four years ago. In the greenhouses are{tomato plants}and{lettuce and{cabbage seedlings.}Outside there are{strawberries}and{potatoes}growing. Some of the{potatoes }are under a polythene tunnel which warms up the ground and makes them grow more quickly.On one side of a field there is a reservoir to supply all the water needed for the crop. The{strawberries and{potatoes}are sold at the farm gate and all the other produce goes to local shops or Nine Elms vegetable market in London.
